title: Murder Uncut
overview: Murder Uncut takes viewers behind the scenes of riveting homicide investigations where body, surveillance, and cellphone cams are critical to cracking the case. Featuring never-before-seen footage that reveals what first responders and detectives experienced first-hand, every episode zooms in on a single thrilling murder investigation.From the crime scene to the interrogation room—to elaborate stings captured on video—investigators, witnesses, and prosecutors provide personal accounts of how they matched wits with the prime suspects to eventually nab the killer.
